Text.Page:
I would be happy to teleport you anywhere you wish to go! It's fun, really! Just remember that I can only send you to camps that you've already visited.

So, where to?

I just received a signal that the supply carriage is under attack. Please talk to me again when you're ready and I'll teleport you to the place immediately. <TEXTBUTTON>Protect the Supply Carriage</TEXTBUTTON><EVENTPAGEBUTTON>Teleport to the Attack Site</EVENTPAGEBUTTON>
